last_episode_to_air.name: SuperRabbit
last_episode_to_air.overview: Bugs tells the story of SuperRabbit, with himself as SuperRabbit, Elmer Fudd as Lex Luthor, and Daffy as Zod, and explains why he gave up the SuperLife.

name: The Looney Tunes Show
overview: Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck and the rest of the “Looney Tunes” characters are back with more adventures for a new generation of viewers. The animated series features roommates Bugs and Daffy moving out of the woods and into the suburbs, interacting with their neighbors, who happen to be other "Looney Tunes" favorites -- including Sylvester, Tweety, Porky Pig and Foghorn Leghorn.

episodes.name: Best Friends
episodes.overview:
Daffy decides the duo can make a quick buck by going on the game show "Besties", where best friends answer questions about one another. However, Daffy's lack of knowledge of anything about Bugs puts a snag in their friendship.

Merrie Melodies: "Grilled Cheese" by Elmer Fudd

episodes.name: Members Only
episodes.overview: When Daffy realizes the country club is open to members only, he determines to gain access and take full advantage of all it offers. Bugs meets his dream girl: Lola Bunny.

episodes.name: Jailbird and Jailbunny
episodes.overview:
During a trip to the Grand Canyon National Park, a careless act by Daffy Duck lands him and Bugs Bunny in the big house - prison!

Merrie Melodies: "Blow My Stack" by Yosemite Sam

episodes.name: Fish and Visitors
episodes.overview:
Bugs and Daffy quickly discover that Yosemite Sam is a less-than-perfect houseguest when they are forced to take him in during a rainstorm. But how can they get him to leave?

Merrie Melodies: "Chickenhawk" by Henery Hawk and Foghorn Leghorn, featuring Barnyard Dawg

episodes.name: Monster Talent
episodes.overview:
Daffy takes Gossamer under his wing, while Bugs stars in a TV commercial for Speedy's new frozen pizza, which ends up giving him unwanted attention.

Wile E. Coyote and Road Runner: "A Zipline in the Sand"

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview:
When Daffy doesn't want to go to his class reunion because he feels he peaked in high school, Bugs tries to help him make something of himself before the big night.

Merrie Melodies: "Cock of the Walk" by Foghorn Leghorn

Wile E. Coyote and Road Runner: "Fee Fi Fo Dumb"

episodes.name: Casa de Calma
episodes.overview:
Instead of relaxing during a spa vacation, Bugs and Daffy spend most of their time fighting over a Hollywood starlet.

Merrie Melodies: "Queso Bandito" by Speedy Gonzales

Wile E. Coyote and Road Runner: "Sail Fail"

episodes.name: Devil Dog
episodes.overview:
When the Tasmanian Devil escapes from the local zoo and shows up on Bugs and Daffy's doorstep, Daffy is terrified. Bugs, however, thinks he's just a lost dog and adopts him.

Wile E. Coyote and Road Runner: "Unsafe at Any Speed"

episodes.name: The Foghorn Leghorn Story
episodes.overview:
Foghorn Leghorn casts Daffy as himself in a movie about his life. Meanwhile, Bugs and Yosemite Sam find a potentially valuable vase buried in the backyard.

Wile E. Coyote and Road Runner: "Silent But Deadly"

episodes.name: Eligible Bachelors
episodes.overview:
Lola sweeps Bugs to Paris in an effort to fall in love and Daffy helps Granny clean the attic and discovers that Granny was once a spy in World War II!

Wile E. Coyote and Road Runner and : "Winter Blunderland"

episodes.name: Peel of Fortune
episodes.overview:
Following a trip to the mall where Bugs opts to purchase both a big screen television and a massage chair, Daffy decides that a good invention is the perfect get-rich scheme. He gets to work in the garage, “inventing” items that have been around for ages.

Merrie Melodies: "We Are in Love" by Lola Bunny and Bugs Bunny

Wile E. Coyote and Road Runner and : "Heavy Metal"

episodes.name: Double Date
episodes.overview:
Lola gives Daffy dating advice, and falls in love with him in the process. But Daffy only has eyes for Tina, and Bugs is surprised to find he might actually have feelings for Lola.

Merrie Melodies: "Be Polite" by Mac and Tosh, featuring Marvin the Martian

Wile E. Coyote and Road Runner: "Wile E. Sisyphus"

episodes.name: To Bowl or Not to Bowl
episodes.overview:
In a bid to defeat his nemesis at the big bowling tournament, Daffy has to swallow his pride and ask Bugs for his help.

Merrie Melodies: "Yellow Bird" featuring Tweety and Sylvester

Wile E. Coyote and Road Runner: "Vicious Cycles"

episodes.name: Newspaper Thief
episodes.overview:
When Daffy discovers his newspaper is missing, he accuses the neighbors of stealing it and sets out to catch "the thief" by setting an elaborate trap during Bugs' dinner party.

Merrie Melodies: "Tasmanian Meltdown" featuring Tasmanian Devil

Wile E. Coyote and Road Runner: "Gone in 60 Parsecs"

episodes.name: Bugs and Daffy Get a Job
episodes.overview:
Proving that work can be fun, Bugs gets a job at Porky's accounting firm. Daffy also gets a job: a nose job.

Wile E. Coyote and Road Runner: "Heartbreak Bridge"

episodes.name: That's My Baby
episodes.overview:
When Tina asks Daffy to babysit her nephew, Daffy discovers the unexpected joys of motherhood. Meanwhile, Bugs discovers how gullible Porky can be.

Merrie Melodies: "Skunk Funk" by Pepé Le Pew

Wile E. Coyote and Road Runner: "Camo-Coyote"

episodes.name: Sunday Night Slice
episodes.overview:
When Bugs and Daffy’s favorite pizza joint closes, Bugs decides to buy and reopen it… but gets in way over his head.

Merrie Melodies: "Daffy Duck the Wizard" featuring Daffy Duck

Wile E. Coyote and Road Runner: "Go Fly a Coyote"

episodes.name: The DMV
episodes.overview:
When Daffy, Lola, and Porky must take driving tests to renew their licenses after run-ins with the law, their driving instructor is Yosemite Sam.

Wile E. Coyote and Road Runner: "Remote Out of Control"

episodes.name: Off Duty Cop
episodes.overview:
Daffy takes on the persona of his television hero, Steve St. James, while Bugs takes on his caffeine addiction, by switching to energy drinks.

Wile E. Coyote and Road Runner: "Butte E. Fall"

episodes.name: Working Duck
episodes.overview:
When Foghorn Leghorn takes a liking to Daffy, he makes him the CEO of his company… with disastrous results.

Merrie Melodies: "Pizzarriba" by Speedy Gonzales

Wile E. Coyote and Road Runner: "Another Bat Idea"

episodes.name: French Fries
episodes.overview:
A plate of French fries threatens to ruin Daffy and Porky’s friendship, as well as Bugs’ chance to see a playoff game. Meanwhile, Yosemite Sam enters a field goal kicking contest.

Merrie Melodies: "Presidents' Day" by Lola Bunny

episodes.name: Beauty School
episodes.overview:
While working on Tina's beauty school homework, Daffy learns to cut hair and finds his calling in life. Meanwhile, Bugs agrees to attend dance lessons with Porky under the identity of Catherine.

Merrie Melodies: "Giant Robot Love" by Daffy Duck, featuring Porky Pig

episodes.name: The Float
episodes.overview:
After a car wash accident on his parade float, Daffy swindles Porky out of all his savings and splurges mercilessly in order to obtain a yacht to replace the parade float.

Merrie Melodies: "You Like / I Like" by Mac and Tosh

episodes.name: The Shelf
episodes.overview:
Bugs tries to hang a shelf to display his Nobel Prize, but the project quickly turns out to be more complicated than he could've ever imagined.

Merrie Melodies: "Chintzy" by Daffy Duck featuring Porky Pig

Wile E. Coyote and Road Runner: "Goner with the Wind"

episodes.name: The Muh-Muh-Muh-Murder
episodes.overview: Daffy Duck sees a news report about the Suburban Strangler and the description matches Porky Pig. Daffy suspects that Porky is a killer, and Bugs has to take care of Lola when she breaks her leg.

episodes.name: Point, Laser Point
episodes.overview:
Bugs thinks that Granny is lonely due to her living with just Sylvester and Tweety. So Bugs and Daffy take her out to entertain her in various ways. Meanwhile, Sylvester becomes obsessed with a Laser Pointer toy which causes him problems when he tries to get the red dot.

Merrie Melodies: "Table for One" by Speedy Gonzales

Wile E. Coyote and Road Runner: "Shut Your Trap"

episodes.name: Bobcats on Three
episodes.overview:
Daffy coaches Gossamer’s water polo team despite having no experience. Meanwhile, Bugs becomes addicted to Porky’s unhealthy, butter-loaded catering.

Merrie Melodies: "Laser Beam" by Marvin the Martian

episodes.name: You've Got Hate Mail
episodes.overview: Daffy accidentally emails a letter to everyone he knows explaining what’s wrong with them and must suffer the consequences. Lola and her parents want Bugs in their family photo.

episodes.name: Itsy Bitsy Gopher
episodes.overview:
When one of the Gophers is reported missing, Daffy and Lola take the case to look for him. Meanwhile, Bugs nearly destroys his home trying to kill a spider.

Merrie Melodies: "Moostache" by Yosemite Sam's Moustache

episodes.name: Rebel Without a Glove
episodes.overview: When Bugs loses his gloves, the motorcycle gloves he gets as a replacement lead him to the life of a rebel. Meanwhile, Daffy is accidentally hired as a college professor.

episodes.name: Semper Lie
episodes.overview: When Bugs tells a small lie to Porky, it gathers steam to make everything far worse — it even prompts Daffy to join the U.S. Marines.

episodes.name: Father Figure
episodes.overview: Volunteering in the Father Figure program, Porky is matched up with the troubled Henry Hawk and Foghorn is paired up with Daffy, who may have lied about his age. Meanwhile, Bugs and Walter train for a tennis match.

episodes.name: Customer Service
episodes.overview: When Cecil Turtle, a customer service representative, intentionally cuts off Bugs’ cable TV, Bugs declares war. Meanwhile, Daffy tries to get a job as a customer service representative supervisor.

episodes.name: The Stud, the Nerd, the Average Joe, and the Saint
episodes.overview: Porky decides to run a marathon, threatening Daffy’s definition of everyone’s roles in their circle of friends. Meanwhile, Yosemite Sam wants to save Bugs' life because Bugs saved his.

episodes.name: It's a Handbag
episodes.overview: Daffy’s world is turned upside-down when his handbag is stolen at the mall, prompting him to hire Porky as his full-time bodyguard. Lola searches the globe for the anniversary gift for Bugs.

episodes.name: A Christmas Carol
episodes.overview:
When the overwhelming heat zaps everyone's enthusiasm for Christmas, Lola decides to stage her own version of A Christmas Carol to renew the town's holiday spirit, while Foghorn and Daffy set off for the North Pole to set up a giant fan that will blow cold air down to their sweltering town.

Merrie Melodies: "Christmas Rules"

episodes.name: We're in Big Truffle
episodes.overview: While babysitting, Lola reads a spell book as a bedtime story to Gossamer and turns him into a frog. Meanwhile, a get-rich-quick scheme gets Daffy and Porky attacked by a giant bear.

episodes.name: Dear John
episodes.overview:
Lola joins a monastery and Bugs buys a boat to sail around the world when they each mistakenly believe the other has ended their relationship. Meanwhile, Daffy runs against Porky for City Council.

Merrie Melodies: "Drifting Apart" by Mac and Tosh

episodes.name: Daffy Duck Esquire
episodes.overview: When Tina’s dad comes to town, Daffy decides to pretend he is a lawyer in order to impress him. Bugs must pretend to be Daffy’s slacker roommate.

episodes.name: Spread Those Wings and Fly
episodes.overview: Daffy and Porky attend a self-help seminar, which inspires Daffy to want to learn how to fly. When that doesn’t work, he settles for becoming an airline flight attendant.

episodes.name: The Black Widow
episodes.overview: Daffy drags Porky along on spring break when nobody else will go with him and the two quickly end up in jail in a small town in Mexico.

episodes.name: Mrs. Porkbunny's
episodes.overview:
Tensions flare when Bugs and Porky start a business together selling carrot cake. Daffy decides to become an actor in commercials since it is easy, high-paying work.

Merrie Melodies: "Stick to My Guns" by Yosemite Sam

episodes.name: Gribbler's Quest
episodes.overview:
Daffy must shake an online shopping addiction when he uses Bugs’ computer to do his online shopping. Daffy is dragged by Yosemite Sam into a group therapy. Bugs is addicted to a video game called Gribbler’s Quest.

Merrie Melodies: "I Love to Sing-A" by Gossamer /  "Parade Float" featuring Daffy Duck

episodes.name: The Grand Old Duck of York
episodes.overview:
Daffy takes piano lessons from Granny. As a result, Bugs gets noise-cancelling earbuds and quickly realizes he can tune out everything.

Merrie Melodies: "Daffy's Legacy" by Daffy Duck, featuring Bugs Bunny

episodes.name: Ridiculous Journey
episodes.overview: After accidentally getting shipped to Alaska, the Tasmanian Devil, Tweety and Sylvester must put aside their differences and make an incredible journey together to return to their happy homes.

episodes.name: The Shell Game
episodes.overview:
Cecil Turtle returns with a broken shell scam that he uses to con Bugs out of money. Meanwhile, when Daffy’s beloved recliner breaks, he and Lola search for a replacement.

Merrie Melodies: "Wonderful Bugs" by Walter Bunny

episodes.name: Year of the Duck
episodes.overview: Daffy is highly insulted when he discovers that ducks are not included in the Chinese zodiac, and attempt to make ducks more popular.

episodes.name: Gossamer Is Awesomer
episodes.overview: Daffy becomes campaign manager for Gossamer’s run for Class President. Porky moves in with Bugs and Daffy after his catering business goes broke, and spends his days reorganizing everything.

episodes.name: Here Comes the Pig
episodes.overview: Daffy convinces Porky that they should go on a road trip to Porky’s third grade girlfriend’s wedding in an attempt to win her back after all these years.

episodes.name: Mr. Weiner
episodes.overview: Daffy enters a hot dog eating contest to try and win the title “Mr. Weiner” and Bugs gets roped into helping Yosemite Sam attempt to jump a school bus over a row of motorcycles.

episodes.name: Best Friends Redux
episodes.overview:
When Bugs meets up with a old friend named Rodney Rabbit, Daffy gets jealous and uses the time vortex at Witch Lezah's to go back in time and ensure Bugs and Rodney never become friends. Meanwhile, Porky Pig wonders about his ranking in Daffy Duck's list of best friends.

Merrie Melodies: "Long-Eared Drifter" featuring Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny and Daffy Duck

episodes.name: SuperRabbit
episodes.overview: Bugs tells the story of SuperRabbit, with himself as SuperRabbit, Elmer Fudd as Lex Luthor, and Daffy as Zod, and explains why he gave up the SuperLife.
